replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
喔, 作者有新聲明了, 今晚會放1.7版單人指令MOD~~

The MC1.7 version of SPC should be out between 8-11.59pm AEST (UTC+10) tonight (Monday 4th July). If you can't wait there is a very buggy development build out on page 526 which will work on MC1.7

Thanks for all your support.
